features: 【Versatile Steamer & Iron 2 in 1】This versatile clothes steamer offers both ironing and steaming functions. It is user-friendly and can be easily switched between modes. When plugged in without pressing the button, it functions as a regular iron. However, by simply pressing the button, it transforms into a steamer. This 2-in-1 feature allows you to choose the most suitable mode for your ironing needs. For optimal ironing results, we highly recommend using the steamer iron mode.

【Portable Travel Essentials】This compact and lightweight clothes iron is specifically designed for travel, vacations, and outings. It ensures that you always have wrinkle-free clothing wherever you go. Its mini size allows it to be easily packed into suitcases and backpacks without occupying much space.

【Powerful & Heating】With a powerful 1000W motor, this steamer provides a constant temperature of 302°F for efficient ironing. It boasts quick heating capabilities, taking only 5 seconds to warm up and just 3 minutes to iron a shirt. This makes ironing clothes, curtains, bed sheets, and more effortless and time-saving. Truly an essential tool for every home and college apartment.

【Convenient & Comfortable】The foldable handle of this compact garment steamer makes it incredibly convenient for storage. It is designed to perform both flat ironing and hanging ironing tasks with ease. Weighing only 1.37 pounds and measuring 6 inches on its longest side, it offers a comfortable grip during use. You won't experience fatigue or discomfort even when ironing clothes for extended periods of time with this steamer.

【Safe & Suitable for All Fabrics】Equipped with a smooth and anti-scratch ceramic panel, this mini iron is capable of efficiently and effectively eliminating creases and wrinkles from fabrics, without causing any damage. It is suitable for use on a wide range of fabric types, including organic fabrics, nylon blends, wool, cotton, linen, and more. Rest assured that this iron is not only suitable but also safe for all your delicate fabrics.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Steamer for Travel & Home This versatile and practical travel steamer both travel and home use. It is travel-friendly and home-ready, which can simplify your life with wrinkle-free clothes.

2 in 1 Functional Steamer for Clothes This versatile garment steamer provides the convenience of both flat ironing and vertical steaming functions, making it an essential tool for maintaining wrinkle-free clothes. With its user-friendly design, switching between modes is effortless. For the best ironing outcomes, we strongly recommend utilizing the steamer iron mode.

Portable & Lightweight This garment steamer is designed to be portable and lightweight, weighing just 1.37 pounds. Its compact size and foldable handle make it incredibly convenient for storage. It is an ideal choice for travel as it won't take up much space in your luggage. Even during extended periods of ironing, you won't experience fatigue or discomfort with this steamer.

Suitable for All Fabrics & Abundant Steam This steamer provides a constant and abundant steam for efficient ironing. Equipped with a smooth and anti-scratch ceramic panel, this portable steamer ensures efficient and effective removal of creases and wrinkles from fabrics, without causing any damage.

Powerful & Efficient Featuring a robust 1000W motor, this steamer delivers a consistent temperature of 302°F. Its rapid heating capabilities allow it to warm up within just 5 seconds, while a shirt can be perfectly ironed in as little as 3 minutes. Additionally, it comes with a convenient 100ml water cup for easy refilling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works so well I love it!!!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this steam iron! It’s super easy to work, light weight and steams so well. I don’t ever have to bring the ironing board out anymore. I just throw the clothes on the bed or on a fleece blanket and it steams it fast and super quick! I rarely write reviews on Amazon but this product is well deserved for a great review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This compact, affordable, user-friendly iron effortlessly straightens clothes
reviews.reviewText: If you're in the market for an iron that's a game-changer, look no further than this compact wonder! This iron is a lifesaver when it comes to making all your clothes impeccably straight without the hassle.Firstly, its compact design is a standout feature. Perfect for those with limited space or frequent travelers, It fits snugly into any corner or suitcase without sacrificing its ironing prowess.Ease of use is another remarkable quality. The straightforward controls make it a breeze for anyone to master.What's truly impressive is its efficiency. This iron tackles wrinkles like a champ, effortlessly transforming your garments into a crisp, polished state. It's a time-saver, making your ironing sessions quick and efficient, leaving you with more time to tackle other tasks or simply relax.And let's talk affordability. This iron delivers top-notch performance without breaking the bank.Overall, this iron is a must-have for anyone seeking reliability, efficiency, and convenience in their ironing routine. Its compact size, user-friendly interface, exceptional performance, and affordability make it a standout choice in the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small and mighty
reviews.reviewText: I am so surprised by the strength of the steamer. I was able to pack it in my luggage and it didn’t take up much space. For items that shouldn’t be ironed, this is a very great option. The only discrepancy that I have with this item is the cord is too short

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and efficient
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for travel, hands down a great find! It warms up extremely fast big plus!!It small and powerful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this iron. Light weight. Easy to use. Good power steam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking for a small steamer for quite some time and stumbled upon this one, and I have to say I’m very pleasantly surprised! Since I work more than 60 hours a week, I often throw my scrubs in my bag without thinking too much, and when I get to the hospital, they’re all wrinkly. This steamer is compact and is easy to take on the go since it’s pretty small. Set up is incredibly simple and instructions were very easy to follow. No more wrinkly scrubs at work for me!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Steam Iron
reviews.reviewText: This steam iron is the smallest and most convenient one I have ever used. I like to travel with it because it is light and small. And it can be used in two ways. For example, it can be picked up and ironed vertically, and it can also be ironed flat. And it has only one button, which shows the switch. It is very simple and convenient to operate. The only drawback is that it has too little space for water. It can only iron one of clothing full of water. But I still like it very much. It is worth five stars. If it is used for travel, I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the job of a portable size product
reviews.reviewText: I had the expectation that this would work as well as a portable size steamer and those expectations were met.The fact that I can flip it to an iron style from an upright steamer style and get between buttons is a cool feature.I brought this with me to a photoshoot where getting a rogue wrinkle out of a piece of clothing or hat on the fly is important. The quick heat up and portability served the purpose.
